data.approach: Update README.md: 1) Fix Task Management section routes (/work->tasks, remove kanban mention), 2) Update Routes table with major views (tasks, files, source, servers, config), 3) Update Architecture section routes, 4) Fix FAQ auto-discovery explanation, 5) Update Quick Start with project adding step

summary: Updated Task Management section - /work changed to /tasks, removed kanban mention
Added Source Control section for /source route
Updated Routes table with major views: /tasks, /files, /source, /servers, /config
Updated Architecture section routes and added components/source
Fixed FAQ auto-discovery - now explains bd init + Add Project workflow
Updated Quick Start to mention Add Project step
Added Supabase integration row to comparison table
Updated Agentic Flywheel step 6 to reference /tasks
Updated README.md to reflect current project structure and views
Removed references to outdated /work and /kanban paths
Prepared for documenting updated architecture and project management features

suggestedTasks.title: Update README with Current Project Views and Architecture
suggestedTasks.description: Comprehensively revise the README to accurately describe current project views: /tasks replacing /work, update architecture section, and clarify project management capabilities. Include details about new views: tasks, files, source, servers, and config.
suggestedTasks.reason: Existing documentation does not reflect current project structure

suggestedTasks.title: Document Supabase Migration and Project Discovery Process
suggestedTasks.description: Create documentation detailing the Supabase migration process and update the quickstart guide to include project addition steps. Clarify the new method for project discovery, replacing the previous ~/code auto-discovery approach.
suggestedTasks.reason: Current documentation lacks clarity on recent infrastructure changes

patterns: Update documentation to match current project structure
